document.discussion_title: What to watch in primetime on NBC: Day 6 | WWLP.com
document.topic_text: PT users: Watch the stream here at 8:00 p.m. PT Women’s gymnastics all-around final 19-year-old Simone Biles is heavily favored to become the fourth consecutive American woman crowned Olympic all-around champion, while teammate Aly Raisman also contends for a medal. Watch the full women’s gymnastics all-around final here Stars are out in the pool Live coverage (ET/CT) of swimming includes another potential four-peat as Michael Phelps duels compatriot Ryan Lochte in the men’s 200m IM final. Other swimming finals include the women’s 200m breast; the men’s 200m back, where Australian Mitch Larkin could snap a U.S. winning streak dating back to 1996; and the women’s 100m free, headlined by Aussie sisters Bronte and Cate Campbell.
